RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 27. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUSIC CITY DANCER pressed early, rallied on the turn and gained a clear lead, drew off in the stretch to win as much the best under firm handling. TITEBLUEJEANS had good position on the inside, was no match for winner but was second best. SHANGHAI ROYALTY was bumped at the start and was allowed to settle, swung wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. WICKED REESE had good early speed and quickly gave way. DOZZA was slow early and no threat. HONEYBEE STINGS contended early and was through after a half.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 95. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 26. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.

CLAIM.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and Splurgin Racing

RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHANGHAI PRINCE was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and widened late under left handed urging. PLAY BALL chased the winner throughout, could not gain late but was second best. PAT'S KARMA was well placed on the inside and went evenly late. OL' L B tracked three wide and lacked a late response. DR. ZARNETT allowed to settle, saved ground, and was no threat late. STONE COLD CAT was no factor. ROSCO P. COLTRANE was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUCKEYE RED dueled early, shook clear on the tun, widened late and was kept to task. EL CONDOR CAZA was allowed to settle on the inside, angled out three wide in the stretch, closed willingly and was second best. RUNAWAY RUSSELL raced close up throughout, lunged in stretch and went evenly late. TIER ONE allowed to settle early, was no menace late. LUNCHATTHELIZARD was off a step slow, rushed to lead on the rail and gradually weakened. MAN'S CHOICE allowed to settle, failed to menace.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 26. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GALACTIC broke sharply and quickly made the lead, led throughout and remained clear late under firm handling. MURRY SPUR was unhurried early, rallied four wide in the stretch, finished well and was second best. KID RUSSELL raced mid pack early, lost ground on the turn, had a mild bid late. EL MARRO had good position throughout and went evenly late. OAKEN chased the winner and weakened in the lane. CLASSIC MO was no factor. CHARLEE'S MAGIC saved ground and was outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply and quickly made the lead, led throughout, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 43. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHISKEY HELPS was allowed to settle early, rallied four wide, quickly drew off late to win as much the best. FAST AS FAST CAN B was away alertly and quickly gained a long lead, remained clear in the stretch, shortened stride late and held place. ROUGE TU RICHES had good position throughout and went evenly late. TRANSPIRED chased the speed on the inside and had no rally. NEW YORK MIRACLE hopped at the start and was no menace. MARK'S BUDDY JACIN raced wide early and was no menace. MISSED THE CALL was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 94. Claiming Purse 20400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pr eferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGICAL EXPRESS had good position early, rallied in the stretch, split horses and drew clear late under firm handling. UNCLE KEVIN raced wide early, rallied in the stretch four wide and drew even, was outfinished late but was second best. PAT DADDY had good position just off the speed, rallied at the quarter pole and drew even, gained a clear lead in mid stretch and faltered late. LAUTREC was unhurried early and trailed on the inside, angled out in the stretch and closed fast. JACK'S ADVANTAGE raced mid pack and was no threat. LAUDA SPEED dueled on the lead and weakened in the stretch. ASTRO JAK dueled from the inside and tired in the stretch. SAVAGE NATION was outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from the inside and tired in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 26. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAT'S RHYTHM was never far back early, angled out five wide in the stretch, had quick burst and quickly drew off while being ridden out. CUT RATES steadied early while between horses, rallied four wide in the stretch and drew even, was outfinished late but held place. CHECK OUT LINE had good position throughout, rallied in mid stretch and drew close but needed more late. SWEET EMPIRE had good position on the inside and faltered late. PISTOL PACKIN BOS quickly gained a clear lead and weakened in the stretch. PAYTON PRETTY stumbled badly at the start and lost her rider and walked off. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action.

ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position on the inside and faltered late

Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 26 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In WeightAllowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNEEDTOCOMEHOME had good position on the inside, awaited room on the turn, angled out two wide in the stretch, drew off late under a hand ride. MIXTER JENSEN dueled early, gained a clear lead on the turn, remained clear in mid stretch, could not match strides late with the winner but held place. TWINSPIREDJOEY tracked three wide and went evenly late. RED HEAD KID pressed the pace until the stretch, then weakened. HAPPY TAKEOVER allowed to settle, failed to menace. ORLEANS STORM saved ground and was no menace. MUCH TIMES TWO wide early, was outrun. SWEET JILL'S JACK was no factor.
